content:
Life Soft stories, joyful moments, and who I am 🌿
Hi, I’m Joy Summer — I collect soft light, odd ideas, and unplanned connections — little moments that turn ordinary days into stories worth remembering.
📸 Photography #Capturing soft light and decisive moments is how I document life.
I like it when my friends call me their photographer click to check for my work!
See more on Instagram 🎶 Music #Sometimes I play the ukulele — it brings sunshine to quiet evenings.
(Video coming soon!)
my ukulele 🎵 🏃 Fitness & Lifestyle #I enjoy trying new ways to stay active.
Lately, I’ve been into Aqua Fit — refreshing and fun, twice a week!
(Photos & clips coming soon!)
✨ Little Q&A # If I can master a superpower, I want to... communicate with plants and animals 🌱 After work, you can find me... lying on the grassland at front campus UofT 🌿 My one-of-a-kind possession... My six-year diary of class memories — a middle school “bestseller,” passed around and filled with friends’ notes during every break 📖 🚀 What’s Next #I’m building this space to share small joys & big dreams.
👉 Curious about my projects? Head over to Work.
summary: Soft stories, joyful moments, and who I am 🌿
